mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((char + str(count) for (char, count) in char_count.items()))

mutants.original_line: return "".join(char + str(count) for char, count in char_count.items())
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((char - str(count) for (char, count) in char_count.items()))

mutants.original_line: return "".join(char + str(count) for char, count in char_count.items())
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((char * str(count) for (char, count) in char_count.items()))
